verbose_text: Asorbic acid participates as a co-factor in multiple reactions, particularly acting as a potent antioxidant, in collagen, neuropeptide and carnitin synthesis, increasing iron absorption, inhibiting histamine release and stimulating the immune system.
evidence: acid participates as a co-factor in multiple reactions, particularly acting as a potent antioxidant, in collagen, neuropeptide and carnitin synthesis, increasing iron absorption, inhibiting histamine
